Snow-capped mountains and glaciers in the background. Scenery of bedrock, snowfields and small lakes. A ray of sunshine seen as star-shaped reflection in a lake. At the bottom, county road 63 passes along winding towards Geiranger. A green carpet of vegetation in the foreground covers the hillslope of Dalsnibba. Picture taken by me on 2011-07-05.
